headline: Evaluating Colgate-Palmolive's (CL) Valuation Following This Week's Modest Share Price Bounce
summary: Colgate-Palmolive (CL) shares have seen minor gains over the past week, adding around 4%. Investors looking at the stock might notice that while the short-term moves are modest, there is some curiosity about its recent performance. See our latest analysis for Colgate-Palmolive. Colgate-Palmolive's modest bounce this week follows a year marked by some headwinds, with a 1-year total shareholder return of -12.7% and the share price still down over 10% year-to-date. While this recent uptick hints...
